The file stemmer.py contains, verbatim, the Porter Stemmer as implemented
at

http://tartarus.org/martin/PorterStemmer/python.txt

The main page for the Porter stemmer (http://tartarus.org/martin/PorterStemmer/)
claims that "All these encodings of the algorithm can be used free of charge 
for any purpose" including (presumably) the encoding in stemmer.py.
